{"id":718850517,"lang":"cpp","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1654861614,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/718850517/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> Map;\n        int Max = 0;\n        int last = -1;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){\n            if(Map.find(s[i]) == Map.end()){\n                Max = max(Max, i - last);\n            }\n            else{\n                last = max(last, Map[s[i]]);\n                Max = max(Max, i - last);\n            }\n            Map[s[i]] = i;\n        }\n        return Max;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
